info.name: fast-gauss
info.summary: CUDA global sort + CUDA-GL interop + geometry shader quad emitting + hardware rasterization + CUDA-GL interop = fast gaussian splatting

info.name: fast-gauss
info.summary: A geometry-shader-based, global CUDA sorted high-performance 3D Gaussian Splatting rasterizer. Can achieve a 5-10x speedup in rendering compared to the vanialla diff-gaussian-rasterization.
